DOC.brief_summary: The study will investigate how well multiple doses of PF-02413873 are tolerated by healthy young women, how the body handles multiple doses of PF-02413873 and which effect PF-02413873 has on sex hormones in healthy young women
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate How The Body Handles Multiple Doses Of PF-0243873 And To Investigate The Effect Of PF-02413873 On Sex Hormone Levels In Healthy Young Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy women of childbearing potential with a regular menstrual cycle Evidence or history of any major disease Pregnant or nursing women Requirement for chronic medication
